text: Kare-ra wa chijo o tabi shite, kare-ra izen no mono no saigo ga dodeatta ka o kansatsu shinai no ka. Kare-ra wa, korera (makka no tashinkyo to) yori mo yuryokude, chijo ni nokosu iseki ni oite mo sugurete ita. Shikashi arra wa, kare-ra o tsumi no tame ni torae rareta. Sonotoki arra kara, kare-ra o mamoreru mono wa hitori mo nakatta
